name: 120 Seconds at ClownWill
description:
FNAF but, Clowns Version and Free!

A.D -  Moving

Q.E  - Right and Left Vents opening

W  - Forward door opeing 

F - Flashlight

Space - Mask Pull down

Enter/Return - Opening Camera System

İf you finish this game pres the ALt + F4 I didn't remember make a exit button.
